title: CBDT Notifies Three Statutory Authorities for Income Tax Exemption under Section 10(46A)
content:
# CBDT Notifies Three Statutory Authorities for Income Tax Exemption under Section 10(46A)

Ek important update hai. Government ne Income-tax Act, 1961 ke Section 10(46A) ke तहत income-tax exemption ke liye teen statutory authorities ko notify kiya hai. Yeh Central Board of Direct Taxes (CBDT) dwara Notifications 167/2025, 168/2025, aur 169/2025, sabhi dated December 04, 2025 ko jaari kiye gaye hain.

Section 10(46A) aise authorities, boards, trusts ya commissions ki specific income ko income-tax se exempt karta hai jo Central ya State Act ke under constitute kiye gaye hain aur public interest mein functions perform kar rahe hain.

**Key Highlights:**
*   **Notified Authorities:** CBDT ne nimnalikhit teen statutory authorities ko income-tax exemption ke liye notify kiya hai:
    *   **Jalandhar Development Authority (Punjab)**
    *   **Ajmer Development Authority (Rajasthan)**
    *   **Tamil Nadu Pollution Control Board (TNPCB)**
*   **Notification Details:** Yeh exemptions Notifications No. 167/2025 (Jalandhar Development Authority), 168/2025 (Ajmer Development Authority), aur 169/2025 (Tamil Nadu Pollution Control Board) ke dwara December 04, 2025 ko announce kiye gaye hain.
*   **Effective Date:** Yeh exemptions Assessment Year (AY) 2024-25 se applicable honge.
*   **Conditions:** Exemption tabhi applicable hoga jab ye authorities Section 10(46A)(a) mein specified purposes ke according apne functions continue rakhenge.
*   **Retrospective Effect:** Notifications mein yeh bhi certified kiya gaya hai ki retrospective effect (AY 2024-25 se) dene se kisi bhi person ko adversely affect nahi kiya ja raha hai.

Yeh kadam in public utility authorities ko unke developmental aur regulatory functions ko efficiently carry out karne mein madad karega.
